short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A privacy preserving extension that redirects Algorand blockchain explorer requests (from AlgoExplorer or Algoscan to Allo)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects URLs from sunset Algorand explorers (algoexplorer.io and algoscan.app) to allo.info. This extension can only interact with algoexplorer.io and algoscan.app. It cannot interact with other domains in any way. No user data is collected.
